channel.title: Godot Interface Tutorial on GDQuest
channel.description: Recent content in Godot Interface Tutorial on GDQuest

item.title: The Shop Course Series is Out Now
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: This month’s course update wraps up the UI arc of the project. With 3 chapters, it’s more content than initially planned (a recurring theme at this point), hopefully for the better ðŸ˜‰ The Shop tutorial series will show you how to both design and code a flexible shop system. It works for J-RPGs, Western RPGs, and any type of game, really. The logic behind the Inventory and the Shop chapters can apply to a wide range of menus.

item.title: Godot Interface Design Course: standalone version
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: If you don’t have the full Godot 3 course and you are only interested in UI design, you can now get our UI master series as a stand-alone course! That way you only pay for the content you want! ðŸ˜Š This initial release contains 25 tutorials, for over 3h30 of content. You’ll learn to create: A pause menu and manage pause An inventory system you can use for any type of game An item menu inspired by old-school Japanese RPGs Animated lifebars and gauges that follow monsters in the game Get the Godot UI Tutorial!
